revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xiaomi |model=MiWiFi 3 |revision=G (R3G) v1 (M35) |series=AC1200 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |est_release_date=03/2017 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L1G81LA-25T |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, J4 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7603EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.10.14; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Xiaomi_XXXX, Xiaomi_XXXX_5G |default_ssid_regex=^Xiaomi_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.31.1 |oui=34:CE:00 |oui_eth=34:CE:00 }} {{TagLine|Xiaomi MiWiFi 3G (R3G)}} :[http://www.mi.com/miwifi3g/ Product page] (CN)
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/xiaomi/mir3g ''Xiaomi Mi WiFi R3G'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :*R3G v1 - [[Xiaomi MiWiFi 3G]] (R3G) - 128MB/256MB, USB 3.0 port ::[[MediaTek]] MT7621AT/MT7603EN/MT7612EN • PCB: M35_R0102 <!--(2017/03/07)--> :*R3G v2 - [[Xiaomi MiWiFi 4A]] (Gigabit) - 16MB/128MB, no USB • [https://openwrt.org/inbox/toh/xiaomi/xiaomi_mi_router_4a_gigabit_edition ToH] ::[[Xiaomi MiWiFi 4A (100M)]] - MT7628AN/MT7612EN, 16MB/64MB • [https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/xiaomi/xiaomi_mi_router_4a_100m ToH]
===Reviews=== *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-119327-1-1.html Review on '''KoolShare''' forums] <!--*[http://mysku.ru/blog/china-stores/54457.html Review on '''Mysku'''] (RU)-->
===Third party firmware=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/xiaomi/xiaomi_miwifi_3g ''Techdata: Xiaomi MiWiFi 3G v1'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://forum.lede-project.org/t/xiaomi-wifi-router-3g/5377 ''Xiaomi MiWiFi 3G'' on '''LEDE Project''' forums] ([http://bigota.miwifi.com/xiaoqiang/rom/r3g/miwifi_r3g_firmware_c2175_2.25.122.bin 'Dev FW']) :[https://git.lede-project.org/?p=source.git;a=commit;h=6e283cdc0da25928f8148805ebef7f8f2b769ee8 Commit to LEDE (OpenWrt) git adding support for R3G] <!--*[http://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=837667 On '''4pda''' forums] (RU)-->
